summary: Edward J. Arrison, M.D., an anesthesiologist, had his medical license summarily suspended by the Maryland State Board of Physicians. He was found to have practiced medicine while impaired by alcohol on July 2, 2020, and admitted to drinking before work, despite a prior disciplinary history for habitual intoxication. Additionally, he provided a false statement regarding his impairment on his 2020 license renewal application.
